title: i keep getting "the client update has began" window
body:
As the title says, everytime i launch lol i get that window that gives information about the new client update then i click "launch" to start the actual new client. It is not affecting my gameplay or anything but its just annoying how i keep getting that window and have to click launch to get into the new client login every time. It didnt use to do this the problem started when i unpinned the lol icon from my task bar then pinned it back. Is there anyway i can get rid of this additional window that comes up before the actual client its super annoying.


Edit: nevermind, i fixed the problem literally 2 seconds after posting that. all i did was unpin the old icon and pin the new icon to my taskbar

replies.body: Yeeeaaaa it can be a little annoying when a program updates with a new shortcut and the old one no longer works. I'm guilty of freaking out over this exact problem myself every once and awhile with the Blizzard app xD.
i got same problem and i cant fix with shorcut omg...

I did hear something from riot that they are fixing a lot of shit and putting a lot of stuff back together, and the Oceania servers may take a while to kick in… what's the deal with this bull shit? I should still be allowed to play the game right? are these new updates excluding some Oceania players or is this just something to do with my computer (which is a mac btw).

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
